item.title: Magic Mouse Is Here To Save The Day
item.description: I really enjoy my Apple iMac. It’s a sleek and user-friendly device. However, I can’t say the same for the Apple Mouse. The tiny ball on the top is its downfall â€“ it gets sticky and unresponsive after only a few hours of use. I constantly have to clean it, but the fix is always temporary. It’s incredibly frustrating! I wish there was a solution to this problem. Just in time, a package from Apple arrived!
